page.title: 10WEAVERS SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: {WEAVERS SPORTS CENTRE}caters for a range of activities for the individual as well as for groups, from fitness training and rollerskating to volleyball and badminton, for young and old alike. Weavers Comprehensive School has use of the facilities until 5 0'clock, after which time it is available to the public. Twenty people are employed here by Wellingborough Council. The complex covers about one acre of land. The Wellingborough Junior schools hold their annual 5-a-side football competitions here and local sports clubs use the facilities for training and tournaments. Occasionally wrestling bouts are held in the main hall.Typical hire prices for 45 minutes are Â£8.70 for the whole hall and Â£1.90 for a badminton court.It is also possible to hire equipment.
